title: MapRecruit Unified Schema
description: Consolidated schema definitions for all database collections including deep nested structures for permissions and settings.

User.description: System users including Admins, Recruiters, and Managers

role.description: Simplified string representation of the user role

roleID.description: Reference to the detailed Role document

AccessibleCompanyID.description: List of companies the user has access to

teams.description: List of client names the user has access to (Legacy/Aliased to Client Access)

avatar.description: URL or base64 string of user profile picture

accessibilitySettings.description: User-specific UI settings (overrides Role settings if applicable)

companyID.description: Companies where this role is applicable

updatedBy.description: User who last modified this role

accessibilitySettings.description: Granular permission flags (Triple-Tier: Visible, Enabled, Editable)

jobTitles.description: Legacy taxonomy (List of job title strings)

passcode.description: Unique code for public application links

Interview.description: Application/Interview tracking records linking Candidate -> Campaign

productSettings.description: Global settings like Franchise mode enablement
